title: Layton Mystery Detective Agency: Kat's Mystery‑Solving Files
resume:
Based on Level 5's Layton's Mystery Journey: Katrielle and the Millionaires' Conspiracy game.

The story is set in London and follows Katrielle as she solves mysteries with her talking dog Sherl.
